metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3528 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the backend in TYPO3 4.5.x before 4.5.19, 4.6.x before 4.6.12 and 4.7.x before 4.7.4 allow remote authenticated backend users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3528` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Pavel Vaysband, Markus Bucher, Susanne Moog, and Jan Bednarik

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.19+dfsg1-1').
